participant_1.background:
My favorite food is jello.
I can t whistle.
I enjoy magic the gathering , it is a card game.
I have 4 pets.
I live in an apartment.

participant_2.background:
I want people to notice me.
I will work hard for whatever i want.
I grew up as an orphan.
I care deeply for my friends and others close to me.
I often play the clown to get attention.

content.text: What are your favorite hobbies?
I love to make people laugh, I often play the clown to get attention.
That's great! I like to make people laugh too. What's your favorite way to do that?
I love to tell jokes and funny stories. I also love to play games like charades and Pictionary.
I love playing games too! I'm not very good at charades, but I'm really good at Pictionary.
I'm not very good at Pictionary, but I'm pretty good at charades.
We should play Pictionary together sometime!
That would be fun! I also love to play board games.
I like board games too! I just got a new game called Dominion. It's a really fun card game.
I've never heard of that game, but it sounds fun! I'll have to check it out.
It is! You can get it online or at your local game store.
I'll definitely check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go out to the movies. I also love to read books.
Me too! I love going to the movies. What's your favorite movie of all time?
That's a hard question! I have so many favorite movies. But I think I would have to say The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
I love those movies too! They're so good. I've seen them all so many times.
Me too! I love the characters and the story. It's so well-done.
I agree! It's one of the best movie trilogies ever made.
I think so too! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, biking, and swimming. I also like to play video games.
I love to hike and swim too! I haven't played video games in a while, but I used to love playing them.
We should go hiking together sometime! I know a great trail near my house.
That sounds like fun! I'd love to go hiking with you.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free
